Returns the internal pathname in generic pathname format, converted to specific string type. Conversion, if any, is specified in [[todo]]. The {{tt|/}} character is used as the directory separator. 

@1@ All memory allocations are performed by {{tt|a}}.

@2@ The encoding in the case of {{tt|u8string()}} is always UTF-8.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | a | allocator to construct the string with}}
{{par req | {{tt|CharT}} must be one of the encoded character types ({{c|char}}, {{c|wchar_t}}, {{c|char16_t}} and {{c|char32_t}})}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The internal pathname in generic pathname format, converted to specified string type.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
